1406660.name: Fantasy Grounds - Aquatic Menace 1!
1406660.description:
Aquatic Menace 1!

This Token Pack contains some uncommon aquatic creatures to be used in your Adventures.
Included 40 Tokens with color/weapon variations.

This product includes:
  • Cecaelia_F_ Dagger
  • Cecaelia_F_ DualRapierDagger
  • Cecaelia_F_ Rapier
  • Cecaelia_F_Harpoon
  • Cecaelia_M_Ranseur
  • Cecaelia_M_trident
  • Dragon_pool (1)
  • Dragon_pool (2)
  • Dragon_pool (3)
  • Dragon_pool (4)
  • Dragon_pool (5)
  • Dragon_Turtle
  • Dragon_Turtle2
  • Dragon_Turtle3
  • Dragon_Turtle4
  • Dragon_Turtle5
  • Elemental_Mantahead
  • Elemental_Mantahead_crimson[water,elemental,summon,monster,sea]
  • Elemental_Seasnake
  • Grindylow_F
  • Grindylow_F_Club
  • Grindylow_F_Dagger
  • Grindylow_F_Harpoon
  • Grindylow_F_spear
  • Grindylow_M
  • Grindylow_M_Club
  • Grindylow_M_Dagger
  • Grindylow_M_Harpoon
  • Grindylow_M_spear
  • Grindylow_Mutant
  • Grindylow_Mutant_Club
  • Grindylow_Mutant_Dagger
  • Grindylow_Mutant_Harpoon
  • Grindylow_Mutant_Spear
  • HippocampusKoi_1
  • HippocampusKoi_2
  • HippocampusKoi_3
  • HippocampusKoi_4
  • HippocampusKoi_5
  • HippocampusKoi_6
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
